suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating a greater variety of line thicknesses and styles. For instance, using thinner lines for finer details and thicker lines for outlines can add depth and interest. Additionally, experimenting with different types of lines, such as dashed, dotted, or wavy lines, can create more texture and visual appeal. Adding more intricate details within the characters and background elements can also enhance the overall complexity and richness of the piece.
